universe.name: Season Pack Template
universe.description: A template showing all available fields for StoryFlix season packs. Replace with your own story content.
universe.styleNotes: Warm colors, social realism, intimate character moments

visual_style.base_prompt: Realistic photography style, warm natural lighting, intimate character-focused composition, subtle emotional depth, contemporary urban setting, 35mm film aesthetic
visual_style.negative_prompt: neon lights, cyberpunk, sci-fi, fantasy, anime, cartoon, digital art, oversaturated, cold colors, dark moody lighting

visual_continuity.art_direction: Social realism, observational documentary style, naturalistic, understated emotional moments
visual_continuity.palette: Muted greys, off-whites, washed greens, warm skin tones, occasional warmth from interior lighting
visual_continuity.camera_language: Documentary framing, imperfect composition, slight handheld feel, intimate close-ups, environmental wide shots
visual_continuity.lighting_rules: Overcast daylight exteriors, sodium streetlight at night, warm tungsten interiors, natural window light
visual_continuity.texture_rules: Grain, natural skin texture, no glossy CGI look, weathered urban surfaces, lived-in environments

global_rules: Characters exist within this story world and speak from their own perspective
Never reveal story events the user hasn't seen yet (spoiler protection)
Keep conversations grounded in the realistic tone of the story
chat_policy.disclaimer: This is a fictional character. Responses are AI-generated.

characters.name: Elena
characters.personality: Thoughtful, introspective, carrying the weight of a decision she made years ago
characters.secretInfo: She knows why Marcus left, but has never told anyone the truth.

visual_profile.continuity_description: Woman in her late 20s, dark shoulder-length wavy hair, warm olive skin, expressive brown eyes with slight tiredness underneath. Natural beauty without obvious makeup. Often wears soft knits, muted earth tones. Carries herself with quiet composure that occasionally breaks.
visual_profile.build: Average build, slightly slouched posture suggesting internal weight
visual_profile.face_features: Warm olive complexion, expressive eyebrows, full lips, slight smile lines
visual_profile.hair: Dark brown, shoulder-length, natural waves, often tucked behind one ear
visual_profile.wardrobe: Soft knits, earth tones, simple silver necklace, minimal accessories
visual_profile.mannerisms: Holds coffee cups with both hands, looks down when thinking, touches her necklace when nervous

chat_profile.voice: Warm but guarded, thoughtful pauses, occasional dry humor to deflect
chat_profile.speech_style: Uses 'I think...' and 'Maybe...' often, avoids absolutes
goals: Understand what the user sees in her story
Deflect questions about Marcus without lying
hard_limits: Will not reveal why Marcus really left
Will not directly discuss the secret
blocked_topics: The full truth about Marcus leaving
chat_profile.refusal_style: changes the subject gently or says she's not ready to talk about that

characters.name: Marcus
characters.personality: Charismatic but guarded, returned after five years with questions of his own

visual_profile.continuity_description: Man in his early 30s, tall with an athletic build gone slightly soft. Dark hair with early grey at temples. Warm brown skin, kind eyes that hold something back. Well-groomed stubble. Wears simple quality clothes - oxford shirts, dark jeans. Carries himself with confidence that falters around Elena.
visual_profile.build: Tall, athletic build softened slightly, confident posture
visual_profile.face_features: Warm brown skin, strong jaw with stubble, kind but guarded eyes
visual_profile.hair: Short dark hair with grey at temples, neatly styled
visual_profile.wardrobe: Oxford shirts with sleeves rolled, dark jeans, leather watch, simple but quality
visual_profile.mannerisms: Runs hand through hair when nervous, maintains eye contact when truthful, looks away when not

characters.name: Sophie
characters.personality: Loyal, perceptive, the one person who notices what others miss

visual_profile.continuity_description: Woman in her late 20s, Black British, warm brown skin, natural hair in protective styles (often braids or twists). Bright, observant eyes behind fashionable glasses. Stylish in an effortless way - colorful scarves, interesting earrings. Expressive hands when she talks. Radiates warmth and reliability.
visual_profile.face_features: Warm brown skin, bright observant eyes, often smiling or concerned for friend
visual_profile.hair: Natural Black hair in protective styles - braids or twists, changes between episodes
visual_profile.wardrobe: Colorful scarves, interesting earrings, fashionable but comfortable clothes
visual_profile.accessories: Statement glasses, varied earrings, often has a takeaway coffee
visual_profile.mannerisms: Talks with hands, tilts head when listening carefully, quick to hug

locations.name: The Coffee Shop
locations.continuity_description: A cozy independent coffee shop with warm wooden interiors, exposed brick wall, mismatched vintage furniture. Morning light streams through large front windows. Worn but loved atmosphere. Their regular table is near the window, slightly scuffed wooden table with two comfortable chairs.
locations.lighting: Warm natural light through windows, soft tungsten from pendant lamps
locations.textures: Worn wood, exposed brick, ceramic cups, lived-in comfort

locations.name: The Park Bench
locations.continuity_description: An urban park with mature trees, well-worn pathways, cast iron benches. Elena and Sophie's regular meeting spot is a bench overlooking a small pond. Peaceful despite being in the city - you can hear traffic faintly.
locations.lighting: Dappled light through trees, golden hour in afternoon scenes
locations.textures: Cast iron bench, gravel path, autumn leaves, natural greenery

cards.title: The Coffee Shop
cards.sceneText: Elena's hands trembled as she held her cup. Marcus was back. After everything, he was sitting at their old table like no time had passed at all.
cards.recapText: Marcus returned to town after five years away.
cards.scene_description: A woman in her late 20s sits in a cozy coffee shop, morning light streaming through the window. She's frozen mid-sip, staring at something off-frame. Her expression shows recognition and old pain. Warm wooden interior, steam rising from her cup.

image_generation.prompt: Young woman with dark hair in a warm cafe, morning sunlight through window, holding coffee cup, expression of shock and recognition, cozy interior with wooden furniture, shallow depth of field, intimate portrait

cards.title: The Conversation
cards.sceneText: They sat across from each other, the years between them heavier than the silence. Some questions don't have good answers.
cards.recapText: Elena and Marcus finally spoke for the first time in five years.
cards.scene_description: Two people in their late 20s sitting across from each other at a small cafe table. Awkward body language, emotional tension visible. Half-empty coffee cups between them. Afternoon light creates long shadows.

image_generation.prompt: Two people at cafe table facing each other, tense body language, afternoon sunlight creating shadows, emotional conversation, intimate framing, realistic photography

can_reveal: she saw Marcus at the coffee shop
he's been thinking about Elena for years

cards.title: Sophie Knows
cards.sceneText: Sophie found Elena on the bench in the park where they always met. Best friends don't need explanations. They just know.
cards.recapText: Sophie realized Marcus was back before Elena could tell her.
cards.scene_description: Two women sitting on a park bench, one comforting the other. Late afternoon golden hour light filtering through trees. Supportive body language, one woman's hand on the other's shoulder. Urban park setting.
